title: Ticket #1236: include release date in version history
description: Proper implementation requires the wrangler to update this date within the manual on the same day as release.
remarks: Included in 7.4.2, 7.4.3, 7.5.1, and 7.5.2 version histories by manual addition. All future manuals will have an item due to adding it to the template used for new version histories.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-19 11:41   Check-in [25298]: all version histories to now include a release date (gittrac #1236) (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
